verses.esv:
27   So God created man in his own image,
    in the image of God he created him;
    male and female he created them.
verses.kjv: 27 So God created man in his own image, in the image of God created he him; male and female created he them.
verses.niv: 27 So God created man in his own image, in the image of God he created him; male and female he created them.

verses.esv: 10 For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus for good works, which God prepared beforehand, that we should walk in them.
verses.kjv: 10 For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus unto good works, which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them.
verses.niv: 10 For we are God's workmanship, created in Christ Jesus to do good works, which God prepared in advance for us to do.

verses.esv: 9 But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for his own possession, that you may proclaim the excellencies of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light.
verses.kjv: 9 But ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, an holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light:
verses.niv: 9 But you are a chosen people, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people belonging to God, that you may declare the praises of him who called you out of darkness into his wonderful light.

verses.esv: 3:1 See what kind of love the Father has given to us, that we should be called children of God; and so we are. The reason why the world does not know us is that it did not know him. 2 Beloved, we are God’s children now, and what we will be has not yet appeared; but we know that when he appears we shall be like him, because we shall see him as he is.
verses.kjv: 1 Behold, what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God: therefore the world knoweth us not, because it knew him not. 2 Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is.
verses.niv: 1 How great is the love the Father has lavished on us, that we should be called children of God! And that is what we are! The reason the world does not know us is that it did not know him. 2 Dear friends, now we are children of God, and what we will be has not yet been made known. But we know that when he appears, we shall be like him, for we shall see him as he is.

verses.esv: 16 Do you not know that you are God’s temple and that God’s Spirit dwells in you?
verses.kjv: 16 Know ye not that ye are the temple of God, and that the Spirit of God dwelleth in you?
verses.niv: 16 Don't you know that you yourselves are God's temple and that God's Spirit lives in you?

verses.esv: 17 Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old has passed away; behold, the new has come.
verses.kjv: 17 Therefore if any man be in Christ, he is a new creature: old things are passed away; behold, all things are become new.
verses.niv: 17 Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation; the old has gone, the new has come!

verses.esv: 37 No, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him who loved us.
verses.kjv: 37 Nay, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us.
verses.niv: 37 No, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him who loved us.

verses.esv:
26 Then God said, “Let us make man in our image, after our likeness. And let them have dominion over the fish of the sea and over the birds of the heavens and over the livestock and over all the earth and over every creeping thing that creeps on the earth.”

27   So God created man in his own image,
    in the image of God he created him;
    male and female he created them.
verses.kjv: 26 And God said, Let us make man in our image, after our likeness: and let them have dominion over the fish of the sea, and over the fowl of the air, and over the cattle, and over all the earth, and over every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth. 27 So God created man in his own image, in the image of God created he him; male and female created he them.
verses.niv: 26 Then God said, "Let us make man in our image, in our likeness, and let them rule over the fish of the sea and the birds of the air, over the livestock, over all the earth, and over all the creatures that move along the ground." 27 So God created man in his own image, in the image of God he created him; male and female he created them.

verses.esv: 7 Beloved, let us love one another, for love is from God, and whoever loves has been born of God and knows God.
verses.kjv: 7 Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God.
verses.niv: 7 Dear friends, let us love one another, for love comes from God. Everyone who loves has been born of God and knows God.

verses.esv: 14 “You are the light of the world. A city set on a hill cannot be hidden.
verses.kjv: 14 Ye are the light of the world. A city that is set on an hill cannot be hid.
verses.niv: 14 "You are the light of the world. A city on a hill cannot be hidden.

verses.esv: 26 for in Christ Jesus you are all sons of God, through faith.
verses.kjv: 26 For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus.
verses.niv: 26 You are all sons of God through faith in Christ Jesus,

verses.esv: 8 but God shows his love for us in that while we were still sinners, Christ died for us.
verses.kjv: 8 But God commendeth his love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us.
verses.niv: 8 But God demonstrates his own love for us in this: While we were still sinners, Christ died for us.

verses.esv: 16 “For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
verses.kjv: 16 For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
verses.niv: 16 "For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

verses.esv:
13   For you formed my inward parts;
    you knitted me together in my mother’s womb.
14   I praise you, for I am fearfully and wonderfully made.
  Wonderful are your works;
    my soul knows it very well.
verses.kjv: 13 For thou hast possessed my reins: thou hast covered me in my mother’s womb. 14 I will praise thee; for I am fearfully and wonderfully made: marvellous are thy works; and that my soul knoweth right well.
verses.niv: 13 For you created my inmost being; you knit me together in my mother's womb. 14 I praise you because I am fearfully and wonderfully made; your works are wonderful, I know that full well.

verses.esv: 8:1 There is therefore now no condemnation for those who are in Christ Jesus.
verses.kjv: 1 There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus, who walk not after the flesh, but after the Spirit.
verses.niv: 1 Therefore, there is now no condemnation for those who are in Christ Jesus,

verses.esv: 20 But our citizenship is in heaven, and from it we await a Savior, the Lord Jesus Christ,
verses.kjv: 20 For our conversation is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ:
verses.niv: 20 But our citizenship is in heaven. And we eagerly await a Savior from there, the Lord Jesus Christ,

verses.esv:
2 May grace and peace be multiplied to you in the knowledge of God and of Jesus our Lord.

3 His divine power has granted to us all things that pertain to life and godliness, through the knowledge of him who called us to his own glory and excellence, 4 by which he has granted to us his precious and very great promises, so that through them you may become partakers of the divine nature, having escaped from the corruption that is in the world because of sinful desire.
verses.kjv: 2 Grace and peace be multiplied unto you through the knowledge of God, and of Jesus our Lord, 3 According as his divine power hath given unto us all things that pertain unto life and godliness, through the knowledge of him that hath called us to glory and virtue: 4 Whereby are given unto us exceeding great and precious promises: that by these ye might be partakers of the divine nature, having escaped the corruption that is in the world through lust.
verses.niv: 2 Grace and peace be yours in abundance through the knowledge of God and of Jesus our Lord. 3 His divine power has given us everything we need for life and godliness through our knowledge of him who called us by his own glory and goodness. 4 Through these he has given us his very great and precious promises, so that through them you may participate in the divine nature and escape the corruption in the world caused by evil desires.

verses.esv: 7 for God gave us a spirit not of fear but of power and love and self-control.
verses.kjv: 7 For God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind.
verses.niv: 7 For God did not give us a spirit of timidity, but a spirit of power, of love and of self-discipline.

verses.esv: 19 Or do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit within you, whom you have from God? You are not your own,
verses.kjv: 19 What? know ye not that your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost which is in you, which ye have of God, and ye are not your own?
verses.niv: 19 Do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit, who is in you, whom you have received from God? You are not your own;

verses.esv: 15 No longer do I call you servants, for the servant does not know what his master is doing; but I have called you friends, for all that I have heard from my Father I have made known to you.
verses.kjv: 15 Henceforth I call you not servants; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth: but I have called you friends; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you.
verses.niv: 15 I no longer call you servants, because a servant does not know his master's business. Instead, I have called you friends, for everything that I learned from my Father I have made known to you.

verses.esv:
15   For thus says the One who is high and lifted up,
    who inhabits eternity, whose name is Holy:
  “I dwell in the high and holy place,
    and also with him who is of a contrite and lowly spirit,
  to revive the spirit of the lowly,
    and to revive the heart of the contrite.
verses.kjv: 15 For thus saith the high and lofty One that inhabiteth eternity, whose name is Holy; I dwell in the high and holy place, with him also that is of a contrite and humble spirit, to revive the spirit of the humble, and to revive the heart of the contrite ones.
verses.niv: 15 For this is what the high and lofty One says- he who lives forever, whose name is holy: "I live in a high and holy place, but also with him who is contrite and lowly in spirit, to revive the spirit of the lowly and to revive the heart of the contrite.

verses.esv: 21 For our sake he made him to be sin who knew no sin, so that in him we might become the righteousness of God.
verses.kjv: 21 For he hath made him to be sin for us, who knew no sin; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him.
verses.niv: 21 God made him who had no sin to be sin for us, so that in him we might become the righteousness of God.

verses.esv: 12 But to all who did receive him, who believed in his name, he gave the right to become children of God,
verses.kjv: 12 But as many as received him, to them gave he power to become the sons of God, even to them that believe on his name:
verses.niv: 12 Yet to all who received him, to those who believed in his name, he gave the right to become children of God--

verses.esv: 10 and you have been filled in him, who is the head of all rule and authority.
verses.kjv: 10 And ye are complete in him, which is the head of all principality and power:
verses.niv: 10 and you have been given fullness in Christ, who is the head over every power and authority.

verses.esv: 3 For you have died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.
verses.kjv: 3 For ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God.
verses.niv: 3 For you died, and your life is now hidden with Christ in God.
